code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{getCars,rentCar}from'../api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CarList=()=>{const[cars,setCars]=useState([]);const fetchCars=async()=>{const response=await getCars();setCars(response.data);};useEffect(()=>{fetchCars();},[]);const handleRent=async id=>{await rentCar(id);fetchCars();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Available Cars"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:cars.map(car=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[car.brand," - ",car.engineType," - ",car.rented?"Rented":"Available",!car.rented&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleRent(car.id),children:"Rent"})]},car.id))})]});};export default CarList;
